document.heading: Designation of Capitalsaurus Court and Technical Correction Amendment Act of 1999

history.narrative: Law 13-41, the “Designation of Capitalsaurus Court and Technical Correction Amendment Act of 1999,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 13-170, which was referred to the Committee of the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 1, 1999, and July 6, 1999, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 19, 1999, it was assigned Act No. 13-114 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 13-41 became effective on October 20, 1999.
